    <metadata>

          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_4f2c279f09f16f10f51900f9d4641b7df81f5cbb</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Electric current</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrischer Strom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Courant électrique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Corrente elétrica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Corrente elettrica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρικό ρεύμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Corriente eléctrica</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a bulb connected to a 3 V battery of cells indicating the direction of flow of electrons or current.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bulb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electron flow</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine Birne, die an eine 3 V 
Batterie der Zellen angeschlossen wird, welche die Richtung des 
Flusses der Elektronen oder des Stromes anzeigen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une ampoule reliée à 
une batterie de 3 V des cellules indiquant la direction de 
l'écoulement des électrons ou du courant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um bulbo conectado a uma 
bateria de 3 V das pilhas que indicam o sentido do fluxo dos elétrons
ou da corrente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una lampadina 
collegata ad una batteria di 3 V delle cellule che indicano il senso 
di flusso degli elettroni o della corrente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει έναν βολβό που συνδέεται
με μια μπαταρία 3 Β των κυττάρων που δείχνουν την κατεύθυνση της 
ροής των ηλεκτρονίων ή του ρεύματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un bulbo conectado con 
una batería de 3 V de las células que indican la dirección del 
flujo de electrones o de la corriente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Birne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrischer Strom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektronfluß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ampoule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">courant électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écoulement d'électron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bulbo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">corrente elétrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fluxo do elétron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lampadina</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">corrente elettrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">flusso dell'elettrone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βολβός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρικό ρεύμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ροή ηλεκτρονίων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">bulbo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">corriente eléctrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">flujo del electrón</string>
          </keyword>
